mapper.sql: id, type, dindex, name, ctype, cip, room
mapper.select: select type from igrs_device where room=#{room} group by type
select d.type,d.dindex,d.ctype,d.cip,d.room,s.attribute,s.value,s.cchannel from igrs_device_status s,igrs_device d where s.device in (select id from igrs_device) and d.id=s.device

select d.id,d.type,d.dindex,d.ctype,d.cip,d.room,s.attribute,s.value,s.cchannel from igrs_device_status s,igrs_device d where s.device in (select id from igrs_device where room=#{room}) and d.id=s.device
select * from igrs_device where room=#{room} and type=#{type}
select * from igrs_device where room=#{room} and ctype=#{clientType}
select d.*,s.attribute,s.cchannel from igrs_device d, igrs_device_status s where d.room=#{room} and d.type=#{type} and d.dindex=#{index} and d.id=s.device
